item.title: Hello World
item.description: import org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.SpringBootApplication; import org.springframework.boot.builder.SpringApplicationBuilder; @SpringBootApplication public class SpringCloudApplication { public static void main(String[] args) { new SpringApplicationBuilder() .sources(SpringCloudApplication.class) .run(args) ; } }
